general_advisory: Complete transplanting of winter vegetable crops. Use low-cost polythene cover above the vegetable nursery to avoid poor germination due to low temperature. For early and maximum yield in Cole crops spray Gibberellic Acid 0.001% L. Do proper field surveillance for pests and diseases regularly and take appropriate plant protection measures accordingly.

advisory: Post-harvesting stage - If ‘Rodent/Rats’ problem is noticed, locate the rodent burrow in the crop field and surrounding areas. Place Aluminium Phosphide 6% tablet per burrow and seal the burrow with mud which will kill the rodents.
Vegetative stage - Control Tobacco Caterpillar by dusting with specified chemicals.
Vegetative stage - Monitor and control Tobacco Caterpillar using specified methods.
Vegetative stage - Control Aphids and Thrips using specified pesticides.
Vegetative stage - Manage Diamond Back Moth infestation with neem-based pesticide.
Planting - Plant Dwarf Cavendish and Robusta variety in specified distances and pit sizes using recommended suckers.
Make necessary arrangements to provide heat especially to chicks during night hours to reduce mortality. Keep the poultry house clean and clamp free.
